title: How to fill the form of the NTSE claim bill for an NTSE scholarship - Quora

response.answer_text: This is an additional answer if you have read kartikeya’s answer. The website looks like if it’s dumb…but it’s not. I recently submitted my claimbills again for a new session easily and this is how.Keep your scanned docs in .jpeg/.jpg and should be below 500KB as safe side. Use MS paint for that! (Open paint and use Ctrl+W)Just after submitting a claim bill (say, claimbill-2), it will show please fill Form-2 (again). JUST IGNORE THAT! this is just a wrong dialog box. Ignore it and Continue to the next Claim bill (claimbill-3) and follow up.Finally after submitting the report card, it shall say, all bills submitted. note down the reference number for future use. JOB DONE! ~JD

Suppose you are studying in 11th and submitting the form for the scholarship. Fill in the details asked in the form - the class will be 11th, the subjects will of 11th, the date of joining will be the opening day for 11th class. You need a bank account in the name of person receiving the scholarship and submit all the bank/account details as the money will be sent directly to the account. This form also needs the principal signature. In the advance receipt part stick a revenue stamp and sign across it. If you don’t do this the form will be sent back. All forms needed to be printed out and filled in and signed by relevant parties, scanned and this scanned copy needs to be uploaded after the form is filled online too. The file size is specified so reduce the size of your file while uploading.
